document.full_text: eight u.s. troops were killed by a roadside bomb in southern afghanistan on thursday in the deadliest single attack on foreign forces in a month, the u.s. military said.
document.title: roadside bomb kills eight u.s. troops in afghanistan
lines_and_colors: eight u.s. troops were killed by a roadside bomb in southern afghanistan on thursday in the deadliest single attack on foreign forces in a month, the u.s. military said.
